main event: A military policeman reported seeing a bright red light moving slowly from east to west over Fort Knox, Kentucky.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on June 8, 1966, at 0315 hours., The object was approximately 200 yards in diameter., It moved at a very low altitude., The report concluded that the information submitted was insufficient for evaluation., The case was forwarded to Project Blue Book for further investigation.
sighted object: bright red light in the sky
